greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Anti-Harborth alternating chaotic sequence, 6th type.
comment: There seem to be a range of sequences of {odd, even} the type: b(2*n+1) = (2*m-1)*b(n), b(2*n+2) = 2*m*b(n) + b(n - 1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2500
H. Harborth, Number of Odd Binomial Coefficients, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 62, 19-22, 1977.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Stolarsky-Harborth Constant
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 15 2006
ext: Name change by _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 30 2016
